title: bzzd crashes if  bootnodes flag specified
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.5

bzzd crashes if bootnodes flag is specified:

```
./bzzd --datadir ~/bzzdata/ --bzzaccount 2970c9b2c89ece4420b4ff10ae8eac0d57be04a3 --ethapi ~/bzzdata/geth.ipc --bzznoswap --bootnodes=enode://c3cfa3e7a458aadb190a63563e83c577d99c0a46b730d287ce51b4a7fd8232bdfba15cee30cd0b90e1c002ad66d5188d3c378c8c1b6d89a1e6788cdb19e0d8b3@52.178.161.30:30330
```


crashlog:
```
I1124 07:49:21.815448 node/node.go:175] instance: bzzd/v1.5.3-unstable/linux/go1.6.2                                            [1/1970]
I1124 07:49:21.821261 p2p/server.go:336] Starting Server
I1124 07:49:23.929303 p2p/discover/udp.go:217] Listening, enode://436a74987ba8aa88c4909671b9992dfa690a56e189c20a854a71fa2d6cbe3c6739aa5a769b88bfc51cbae6aebd313b267daa9265ea849716ad8f8e7e18fe8f32@[::]:30399
I1124 07:49:23.929525 swarm/swarm.go:178] Starting Swarm service
I1124 07:49:23.929589 p2p/server.go:604] Listening on [::]:30399
I1124 07:49:23.929681 swarm/network/kademlia/kaddb.go:341] loaded kaddb with 0 nodes from /home/tron/bzzdata/bzzd/bzz-2970c9b2c89ece4420b4ff10ae8eac0d57be04a3/bzz-peers.json
I1124 07:49:23.929711 swarm/swarm.go:184] Swarm network started on bzz address: 0d2e3f38aa3b79ca521fa72a7deddd200bdc7ffd5e06fa788b76a94758859b7c
I1124 07:49:23.930183 swarm/api/http/server.go:68] Swarm HTTP proxy started on localhost:8500
panic: interface conversion: flag.Value is *flag.stringValue, not *cli.StringSlice [recovered]
        panic: interface conversion: flag.Value is *flag.stringValue, not *cli.StringSlice

goroutine 1 [running]:
panic(0xd5aac0, 0xc820096980)
        /usr/lib/go-1.6/src/runtime/panic.go:481 +0x3e6

        /home/tron/go/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/gopkg.in/urfave/cli.v1/app.go:473 +0x417
panic(0xd5aac0, 0xc820096980)
        /usr/lib/go-1.6/src/runtime/panic.go:443 +0x4e9
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/gopkg.in/urfave/cli%2ev1.(*Context).GlobalStringSlice(0xc8202e7040, 0xea2210, 0x9, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)        /home/tron/go/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/gopkg.in/urfave/cli.v1/context.go:181 +0x14d
main.bzzd(0xc8202e7040, 0x0, 0x0)
        /home/tron/go/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/cmd/bzzd/main.go:140 +0xff
reflect.Value.call(0xc0dce0, 0x1086df8, 0x13, 0xe84fe8, 0x4, 0xc82042bb30, 0x1, 0x1, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
````
